title.en: A Record of the Successive Incarnations

text.en: Oṃ svasti!
text.en-trans: om soti

text.en: Vairocana, source of all incarnations, pervading existence and peace,
text.en-trans: sizhi khyabdak trulzhi namnang dzé

text.en: Vajradharma, the śrāvaka Ānanda,
text.en-trans: dorjé chö dang nyentö küngawo

text.en: King Jaḥ, noble Āryadeva,
text.en-trans: gyalpo dza dang arya devé zhab

text.en: Kṛṣṇācārya, Tönmi Sambhoṭa,
text.en-trans: nakpo chöpa tün mi sambho ta

text.en: Śāntigarbha, the great abbot Śāntarakṣita,
text.en-trans: shantim garbha khenchen zhiwatso

text.en: Vairotsana, the great Nyak lotsāwa Jñānakumāra,
text.en-trans: bai ro tsa na nyak lo yeshe ché

text.en: Lhalung Palgyi Dorje, Zurchen Shakya Jungne,
text.en-trans: lha lung pal dor zur chen shakya jung

text.en: Drapa Ngönshé, Rongzom, Pamting Jigme Drakpa,
text.en-trans: dra ngön rong zom pam ting jikme drak

text.en: Khyungpo Naljor, noble Dīpaṃkara,
text.en-trans: khyungpo naljor di pam ka ra zhab

text.en: Rechungpa, Chadul Tsöndrü Bar,
text.en-trans: ré chungpa dang ja dul tsöndrü bar

text.en: Sakya Paṇḍita, Melong Dorje, the omniscient Longchenpa,
text.en-trans: sa pen melong dorjé künkhyen jé

text.en: Lhodrak Lekyi Dorje, Jamyang Tashi Palden,
text.en-trans: lho drak lé dor jamyang tashi pal

text.en: Dharma Lord Shadeu Trulshik Kunga,
text.en-trans: trulzhik kün ga chöjé zha dé'u

text.en: Kunga Nyingpo, noble Gyurme Dorje,
text.en-trans: kün ga nyingpo gyurmé dorjé zhab

text.en: Guyang Lodé, Trulshik Dongak Lingpa,
text.en-trans: guyang lo dé trulzhik do ngak ling

text.en: And, in future Möpa Tayé and the rest—this garland of rebirths
text.en-trans: ma ong möpa sok té kyewé treng

text.en: Appears to those to be trained like the moon's reflection in water.
text.en-trans: gang dul mö ngor chu nang da zuk zhin

text.en: Now, according to the prophecies of several noble beings,
text.en-trans: danta dampé kyebu duma yi

text.en: You appear as the one called Ngawang Dongak Tenzin Norbu,
text.en-trans: lung gi ngawang do ngak ten nor ram

text.en: Or Gyurme Chökyi Lodrö—
text.en-trans: gyurmé chökyi lodrö zhejawar

text.en: With unshakeable faith and inspiration, I pray to you!
text.en-trans: miché dé dang dangwé solwa deb

text.en: To the source and all these dance-like emanations,
text.en-trans: trulzhi trulpa natsok rolpé gar

text.en: You from whom they radiate and in whom they are embodied,
text.en-trans: jinyé tro zhing malü düpé ku

text.en: I pray: swiftly inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jinlab nyur juk shok
